price: 4. Waxaan u abuurnay Aadmiga qaab kan u wanaagsan.
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
